page.title: 04OCCUPATIONS IN BALQUHIDDER
page.content: In the summer season the people of Balquhidder are employed in different tourist occupations. Hotels and guest houses are open and Kingshouse hotel has a popular bar. There is also a restaurant nearby which caters for passing tourists. There is a campsite being opened and pony treking will be available there. Altogether there are seven farms in the glen. There is one pig farm and the others are mostly hill farms. Forestry is an expanding industry in this area and some men work at this. There are two joiners and builders and there is a local shop which sells fishing tackle and groceries. Also in the glen there is a teacher, a nurse and a minister and the rest of the people living here are retired and no longer work.
